name: Shakib Al Hasan
about: Shakib Al Hasan is a Bangladeshi international cricketer and former captain of the national team. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest all-rounders in the history of cricket. Shakib holds the record for being the first cricketer to be ranked the No.1 all-rounder in all three formats by the ICC.

name: Mushfiqur Rahim
about: Mushfiqur Rahim is a Bangladeshi cricketer and former captain of the national team. He is known for his aggressive batting style and has been a consistent performer for Bangladesh across all formats. Mushfiqur is also one of the most experienced players in the team.

name: Mahmudullah
about: Mahmudullah is a Bangladeshi cricketer known for his calm demeanor and finishing abilities. He has played crucial roles in many of Bangladesh's victories and is respected for his leadership qualities and experience.

name: Mehidy Hasan Miraz
about: Mehidy Hasan Miraz is a Bangladeshi all-rounder who plays as a right-handed batsman and right-arm off-break bowler. He has been instrumental in Bangladesh's spin attack and has contributed significantly with the bat in the lower order.

name: Mustafizur Rahman
about: Mustafizur Rahman, also known as 'The Fizz', is a Bangladeshi left-arm fast-medium bowler renowned for his off-cutters and variations. He made a sensational debut in 2015, taking 11 wickets in his first two ODIs against India, a record in cricket history.

name: Liton Das
about: Liton Das is a Bangladeshi wicket-keeper batsman known for his elegant stroke play. He holds the record for the highest individual score by a Bangladeshi batsman in ODIs, scoring 176 runs against Zimbabwe.

name: Taskin Ahmed
about: Taskin Ahmed is a Bangladeshi right-arm fast bowler known for his pace and aggression. He has been a key figure in Bangladesh's pace attack and has delivered match-winning performances in various formats.

name: Najmul Hossain Shanto
about: Najmul Hossain Shanto is a Bangladeshi top-order batsman and the current captain of the national team in Test and ODI formats. He has shown promise with several significant innings and is considered a future star for Bangladesh.

name: Tanzid Hasan
about: Tanzid Hasan is a young Bangladeshi cricketer who has represented the national team in various formats. He is known for his aggressive batting style and has been a part of Bangladesh's youth development programs.

name: Towhid Hridoy
about: Towhid Hridoy is a Bangladeshi middle-order batsman who has shown potential in domestic and international cricket. He is known for his composure at the crease and ability to build innings under pressure.
